mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_key FROM `ums_member_role_relation` AS mr JOIN `ums_role_permission_relation` AS rp ON mr.`role_id` = rp.`role_id` JOIN `ums_permission` AS p ON rp.`permission_id` = p.`id` WHERE mr.`member_id` = #{memberId} AND p.`permission_type` IN ('M', 'B') AND p.`status` = 0 AND p.`is_deleted` = 0
